mapper.select: SELECT kind,number,grade,spyb,createtime, kind1,num,grade1,createtime1,spyb1 from (SELECT kind,sum(number) as number,grade,createtime,spyb from purchase_info WHERE createtime like '%${date1}%' and status ='1' and type='0' GROUP BY kind,grade,spyb)as cg LEFT JOIN (SELECT kind as kind1,sum(num)as num,grade as grade1,createtime as createtime1,spyb as spyb1 from require_info WHERE createtime like '%${date2}%' GROUP BY kind,grade,spyb) as xq on cg.kind = xq.kind1 and cg.grade = xq.grade1 and cg.spyb = xq.spyb1 UNION SELECT kind,number,grade,spyb,createtime, kind1,num,grade1,createtime1,spyb1 from (SELECT kind,sum(number) as number,grade,createtime,spyb from purchase_info WHERE createtime like '%${date1}%' and status ='1' and type='0' GROUP BY kind,grade,spyb)as cg RIGHT JOIN (SELECT kind as kind1,sum(num)as num,grade as grade1,createtime as createtime1,spyb as spyb1 from require_info WHERE createtime like '%${date2}%' GROUP BY kind,grade,spyb) as xq on cg.kind = xq.kind1 and cg.grade = xq.grade1 and cg.spyb = xq.spyb1
